infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to provide location-based features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need continuous access to your location to support background updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to take photos within the app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select or save images.
